document.heading: Way to Work Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-118, the “Way to Work Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-286 which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 7, 2006, and March 7, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 23, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-335 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-118 became effective on June 8, 2006.
